db:abstract.db:para: The QTextCharFormat class provides formatting information for characters in a QTextDocument.

db:note.db:para: All functions in this class are reentrant.

db:listitem.db:para: QTextCharFormat is part of Rich Text Processing APIsshared

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The character format of text in a document specifies the visual properties of the text, as well as information about its role in a hypertext document.

The font used can be set by supplying a font to the setFont() function, and each aspect of its appearance can be adjusted to give the desired effect. setFontFamily() and setFontPointSize() define the font's family (e.g. Times) and printed size; setFontWeight() and setFontItalic() provide control over the style of the font. setFontUnderline(), setFontOverline(), setFontStrikeOut(), and setFontFixedPitch() provide additional effects for text.

The color is set with setForeground(). If the text is intended to be used as an anchor (for hyperlinks), this can be enabled with setAnchor(). The setAnchorHref() and setAnchorNames() functions are used to specify the information about the hyperlink's destination and the anchor's name.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.3] enum QTextCharFormat::FontPropertiesInheritanceBehavior
db:section.db:para: This enum specifies how the setFont() function should behave with respect to unset font properties.

db:td.db:para: If a property is not explicitly set, do not change the text format's property value.
If a property is not explicitly set, override the text format's property with a default value.

db:section.db:para: This enum was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: enum QTextCharFormat::UnderlineStyle
db:section.db:para: This enum describes the different ways drawing underlined text.

db:td.db:para: Text is draw without any underlining decoration.
A line is drawn using Qt::SolidLine.
Dashs and dots are drawn using Qt::DashDotLine.
The text is underlined using a wave shaped line.
The underline is drawn depending on the QStyle::SH_SpellCeckUnderlineStyle style hint of the QApplication style. By default this is mapped to WaveUnderline, on macOS it is mapped to DashDotLine.

db:section.db:title: enum QTextCharFormat::VerticalAlignment
db:section.db:para: This enum describes the ways that adjacent characters can be vertically aligned.

db:td.db:para: Adjacent characters are positioned in the standard way for text in the writing system in use.
Characters are placed above the base line for normal text.
Characters are placed below the base line for normal text.
The center of the object is vertically aligned with the base line. Currently, this is only implemented for inline objects.
The bottom edge of the object is vertically aligned with the base line.
The top edge of the object is vertically aligned with the base line.
The base lines of the characters are aligned.

db:section.db:title: QTextCharFormat::QTextCharFormat()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new character format object.

db:section.db:title: QString QTextCharFormat::anchorHref() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the text format's hypertext link, or an empty string if none has been set.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.3] QStringList QTextCharFormat::anchorNames() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the anchor names associated with this text format, or an empty string list if none has been set. If the anchor names are set, text with this format can be the destination of a hypertext link.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.3.

db:section.db:title: QFont QTextCharFormat::font() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the font for this character format.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.4] QFont::Capitalization QTextCharFormat::fontCapitalization() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current capitalization type of the font.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.4.

db:section.db:title: QString QTextCharFormat::fontFamily() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the text format's font family.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextCharFormat::fontFixedPitch() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the text format's font is fixed pitch; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.8] QFont::HintingPreference QTextCharFormat::fontHintingPreference() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the hinting preference set for this text format.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.8.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextCharFormat::fontItalic() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the text format's font is italic; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.5] bool QTextCharFormat::fontKerning() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the font kerning is enabled.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.5.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.4] qreal QTextCharFormat::fontLetterSpacing() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current letter spacing.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.0] QFont::SpacingType QTextCharFormat::fontLetterSpacingType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the letter spacing type of this format..
This function was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextCharFormat::fontOverline() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the text format's font is overlined; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: qreal QTextCharFormat::fontPointSize() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the font size used to display text in this format.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.0] int QTextCharFormat::fontStretch() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current font stretching.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextCharFormat::fontStrikeOut() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the text format's font is struck out (has a horizontal line drawn through it); otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.5] QFont::StyleHint QTextCharFormat::fontStyleHint() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the font style hint.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.5.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.5] QFont::StyleStrategy QTextCharFormat::fontStyleStrategy() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current font style strategy.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.5.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextCharFormat::fontUnderline() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the text format's font is underlined; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: int QTextCharFormat::fontWeight() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the text format's font weight.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.4] qreal QTextCharFormat::fontWordSpacing() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current word spacing value.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.4.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextCharFormat::isAnchor() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the text is formatted as an anchor; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextCharFormat::isValid() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this character format is valid; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setAnchor(bool anchor)
db:section.db:para: If anchor is true, text with this format represents an anchor, and is formatted in the appropriate way; otherwise the text is formatted normally. (Anchors are hyperlinks which are often shown underlined and in a different color from plain text.)
The way the text is rendered is independent of whether or not the format has a valid anchor defined. Use setAnchorHref(), and optionally setAnchorNames() to create a hypertext link.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setAnchorHref(const QString &value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the hypertext link for the text format to the given value. This is typically a URL like "http://example.com/index.html".
The anchor will be displayed with the value as its display text; if you want to display different text call setAnchorNames().
To format the text as a hypertext link use setAnchor().

db:section.db:title: [since 4.3] void QTextCharFormat::setAnchorNames(const QStringList &names)
db:section.db:para: Sets the text format's anchor names. For the anchor to work as a hyperlink, the destination must be set with setAnchorHref() and the anchor must be enabled with setAnchor().
This function was introduced in Qt 4.3.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.3] void QTextCharFormat::setFont(const QFont &font, QTextCharFormat::FontPropertiesInheritanceBehavior behavior)
db:section.db:para: Sets the text format's font.

If behavior is QTextCharFormat::FontPropertiesAll, the font property that has not been explicitly set is treated like as it were set with default value; If behavior is QTextCharFormat::FontPropertiesSpecifiedOnly, the font property that has not been explicitly set is ignored and the respective property value remains unchanged.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setFont(const QFont &font)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Sets the text format's font.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.4] void QTextCharFormat::setFontCapitalization(QFont::Capitalization capitalization)
db:section.db:para: Sets the capitalization of the text that apppears in this font to capitalization.
A font's capitalization makes the text appear in the selected capitalization mode.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.4.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setFontFamily(const QString &family)
db:section.db:para: Sets the text format's font family.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setFontFixedPitch(bool fixedPitch)
db:section.db:para: If fixedPitch is true, sets the text format's font to be fixed pitch; otherwise a non-fixed pitch font is used.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.8] void QTextCharFormat::setFontHintingPreference(QFont::HintingPreference hintingPreference)
db:section.db:para: Sets the hinting preference of the text format's font to be hintingPreference.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.8.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setFontItalic(bool italic)
db:section.db:para: If italic is true, sets the text format's font to be italic; otherwise the font will be non-italic.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.5] void QTextCharFormat::setFontKerning(bool enable)
db:section.db:para: Enables kerning for this font if enable is true; otherwise disables it.
When kerning is enabled, glyph metrics do not add up anymore, even for Latin text. In other words, the assumption that width('a') + width('b') is equal to width("ab") is not neccesairly true.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.5.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.4] void QTextCharFormat::setFontLetterSpacing(qreal spacing)
db:section.db:para: Sets the letter spacing of this format to the given spacing. The meaning of the value depends on the font letter spacing type.
For percentage spacing a value of 100 indicates default spacing; a value of 200 doubles the amount of space a letter takes.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.0] void QTextCharFormat::setFontLetterSpacingType(QFont::SpacingType letterSpacingType)
db:section.db:para: Sets the letter spacing type of this format to letterSpacingType.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setFontOverline(bool overline)
db:section.db:para: If overline is true, sets the text format's font to be overlined; otherwise the font is displayed non-overlined.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setFontPointSize(qreal size)
db:section.db:para: Sets the text format's font size.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.0] void QTextCharFormat::setFontStretch(int factor)
db:section.db:para: Sets the stretch factor for the font to factor.

The stretch factor changes the width of all characters in the font by factor percent. For example, setting factor to 150 results in all characters in the font being 1.5 times (ie. 150%) wider. The default stretch factor is 100. The minimum stretch factor is 1, and the maximum stretch factor is 4000.
The stretch factor is only applied to outline fonts. The stretch factor is ignored for bitmap fonts.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setFontStrikeOut(bool strikeOut)
db:section.db:para: If strikeOut is true, sets the text format's font with strike-out enabled (with a horizontal line through it); otherwise it is displayed without strikeout.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.5] void QTextCharFormat::setFontStyleHint(QFont::StyleHint hint, QFont::StyleStrategy strategy = QFont::PreferDefault)
db:section.db:para: Sets the font style hint and strategy.
Qt does not support style hints on X11 since this information is not provided by the window system.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.5.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.5] void QTextCharFormat::setFontStyleStrategy(QFont::StyleStrategy strategy)
db:section.db:para: Sets the font style strategy.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.5.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setFontUnderline(bool underline)
db:section.db:para: If underline is true, sets the text format's font to be underlined; otherwise it is displayed non-underlined.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setFontWeight(int weight)
db:section.db:para: Sets the text format's font weight to weight.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.4] void QTextCharFormat::setFontWordSpacing(qreal spacing)
db:section.db:para: Sets the word spacing of this format to the given spacing, in pixels.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.4.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setTextOutline(const QPen &pen)
db:section.db:para: Sets the pen used to draw the outlines of characters to the given pen.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.3] void QTextCharFormat::setToolTip(const QString &text)
db:section.db:para: Sets the tool tip for a fragment of text to the given text.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.3.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setUnderlineColor(const QColor &color)
db:section.db:para: Sets the underline color used for the characters with this format to the color specified.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.2] void QTextCharFormat::setUnderlineStyle(QTextCharFormat::UnderlineStyle style)
db:section.db:para: Sets the style of underlining the text to style.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.2.

db:section.db:title: void QTextCharFormat::setVerticalAlignment(QTextCharFormat::VerticalAlignment alignment)
db:section.db:para: Sets the vertical alignment used for the characters with this format to the alignment specified.

db:section.db:title: QPen QTextCharFormat::textOutline() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the pen used to draw the outlines of characters in this format.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.3] QString QTextCharFormat::toolTip() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the tool tip that is displayed for a fragment of text.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.3.

db:section.db:title: QColor QTextCharFormat::underlineColor() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the color used to underline the characters with this format.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.2] QTextCharFormat::UnderlineStyle QTextCharFormat::underlineStyle() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the style of underlining the text.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.2.

db:section.db:title: QTextCharFormat::VerticalAlignment QTextCharFormat::verticalAlignment() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the vertical alignment used for characters with this format.

db:section.db:title: Obsolete Members for QTextCharFormat
db:section.db:para: The following members of class QTextCharFormat are deprecated. We strongly advise against using them in new code.

db:section.db:title: [deprecated] QString QTextCharFormat::anchorName() const
db:section.db:para: This function is deprecated. We strongly advise against using it in new code.
This function is deprecated. Use anchorNames() instead.
Returns the anchor name associated with this text format, or an empty string if none has been set. If the anchor name is set, text with this format can be the destination of a hypertext link.

db:section.db:title: [deprecated] void QTextCharFormat::setAnchorName(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: This function is deprecated. We strongly advise against using it in new code.
This function is deprecated. Use setAnchorNames() instead.
Sets the text format's anchor name. For the anchor to work as a hyperlink, the destination must be set with setAnchorHref() and the anchor must be enabled with setAnchor().
